TechFest 2024 - Debugging Battle

Test Your Debugging Skills!

Event Details

Date of Event

12th November 2024

Coordinators

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

Teacher: Prof. John Doe

About Debugging Battle

Debugging Battle is a competition designed for coding enthusiasts to test their debugging skills. Participants will be provided with faulty code snippets in various programming languages, and their task is to identify and fix the bugs within a specified time frame.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, this competition will challenge your problem-solving abilities and logical thinking. Debugging requires a sharp eye for details and quick thinking, so gear up for an intense battle of coding prowess!

Participants who can swiftly and accurately fix the errors will be awarded exciting prizes!

Rules and Regulations

  • Participants can compete individually or in teams of 2 members.
  • Each team will receive 3 code snippets with bugs to fix.
  • The use of the internet is strictly prohibited during the competition.
  • All bugs must be resolved within 1 hour.
  • The team with the most correct solutions in the shortest time wins.
